overview: Girlfriends Films present "Lesbian Seductions Older/Younger 34", starring Bree Daniels, Nicole Moore, Brenda James, Brooke Van Buuren, Brooke Lee Adams, Dyanna Lauren, Lone Star Angel and Zoey Andrews. Their only sin is unconventional love. The revealing twisted road from desire to pursuit and surrender...
tagline: The revealing twisted road from desire to pursuit and surrender.
title: Lesbian Seductions: Older/Younger 34
